item.title: Point to Point Dedicated T1
item.description:
Although a traditional service, point-to-point dedicated T1 lines remain popular. This article examines their functionality and applications. ](http://www.t1t3today.com/) Initially designed for internal use, telephone companies used T1 lines to combine 24 individual analog phone lines into a single digital connection. Their key characteristics included serial digital transmission via a maximum of two twisted pair wires, regeneration to extend transmission distance, fixed private connections between two points, a multiplexing method to separate concurrent calls, and a 1...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/point-to-point-dedicated-t1/
